options.name: Te Aupouri Smokestone
options.description: May be activated when a friendly unit fails a Break Test (after any rerolls). Until the end of the phase, enemy units within 18" of the bearer have their Charge Range, Pursuit Distance, and Overrun Distance rolls Minimised.

options.name: Stampede Resonator Crystal
options.description: May be activated at the start of any Charge Phase. Choose one friendly unit containing models with Height 4 or 5 within 18". The chosen unit loses Stomp Attack and gains Impact Hits(X), where X is equal to its amount of hits from its Stomp Attack. If a model already had Impact Hits, increase the number of hits by its amount of Stomp Attack instead.

options.name: Koru Stone
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Rally Around the Flag.

options.name: Obelisk of Collaboration
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Pack Hunter.

options.name: Serpent's Nest Charm
options.description: Att is set to 6. Poison Attacks.

options.name: Glory of the Dawn Age
options.description: +1 Str and Lethal Strike. Natural to-wound rolls of ‘6’ gain Multiple Wounds(2).

options.name: Alchemical Arrows
options.description: Number of Shots is set to 4. All Magnetic Short Bows in the wielder's unit have their Str set to 4.

options.name: Vital Essence
options.description: +1 HP and Regeneration(4+).

options.name: Starfall Lodestone
options.description: The bearer's model gains Immune(Flaming Attacks), Hard Target(1).

options.name: Imbued Jade
options.description: Channel(+1) and Regeneration(5+).

options.name: Ancient Plaque
options.description: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell, if no other friendly Wizard has made a Casting Roll this phase, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll.

options.name: Carved Tablet
options.description: Carved Wisdom (see Howdah Devices).

options.name: Carved Wisdom
options.description:
Select one of the following spells as a Bound Spell. It may not be changed during Pre-Game Selections.
		 Fate's Judgement=free as Bound Spell(3+),
		 Molten Copper=free as Bound Spell(4+),
		 Swarm of Insects=free as Bound Spell(5+),
		 Touch of the Reaper=free as Bound Spell(3+),

options.name: Lodestone Shield
options.description: Friendly units within 8" of the model gain Aegis(5+, against Ranged Attacks).

options.name: Magnetic Great Bow
options.description:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Magnetic Great Bow418"363Accurate, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire, +1 to hit against Metal Armour

options.name: Monolith of Vitalism
options.description: The model gains Rally Around the Flag.

options.name: Suncatcher Crystal
options.description:
The model gains an additional model part:
& & & & & &
Suncatcher Crystal & 2& 3& 6& 3& 2& Flaming Attacks, Construct

options.name: Veil Mastery
options.description: The model gains Channel(2).

options.name: Farseeing Mastery
options.description: Learned Spells cast by the model gain +6" Range. Aura Spells gain +3" Range instead.

options.name: Eternal Mastery
options.description: The model's Casting Rolls for Learned Spells gains a +1 modifier.

options.name: Forbidden Mastery
options.description: Select either Pyromancy,Occultism; the model knows two additional spells from the chosen Path, which must be selected from the Apprentice Spell and Adept Spells (#1--#4). Casting Rolls for these spells suffer a -1 modifier.

options.name: Mystifying Mastery
options.description: The first failed Dispell Roll during each enemy Magic Phase must be rerolled.

options.name: Guiding Mastery
options.description: At the start of each friendly Player Turn, the model may choose a friendly unit entirely with Magnasaur within 12". The unit must reroll failed Charge Range rolls. Duration: One Turn.

options.name: Maddening Mastery
options.description: The model gains , Musician, Horror.

options.name: Invasive Mastery
options.description: Once per friendly Magic Phase, the model may choose a Learned Spell that was successfully cast by an enemy Wizard in the previous Magic Phase. Hereditary Spells cannot be chosen. The model knows the chosen spell until the end of the phase.

options.name: Ambush (within 8″ of a friendly Titanopod) (Max. 1 units/army)
